Here, this is where I found mine.

Click here
[/quote]First thing, Lugmfr, I laughed for like five minutes when I “Clicked Here”, Anyways as for you RunescapeRemakes, If that didn’t help you then what will? Don’t expect to get spoonfed because that will not happen on these forums. Here is a suggestion, Download a source that has it, Learn off that code, and then add it yourself. Isn’t that simple enough? It is for most people out there.
Edit By the way, You can’t Rep++, you are only have nine reputation. You need fifteen to rep others.

i can on my other account, derp[/quote]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342270.0.html
Might want to read these. You may only have one account, You don’t believe me. Read them. You broke Rule #4.

If you are using hyperion you should do things on your own. +

  1. We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought. We encourage independent thought, meaning you must help yourselves before requesting help. Failure to provide some sort of prior knowledge or work to the problem will result in a lock of the topic. This is final.

[/quote]

item.title: [Hyperion] Jail and Unjail command help [Hyperion]
item.dc:creator: @RuneScape_Remake RuneScape Remake
item.description:
@RuneScape_Remake wrote:

[size=18pt]I need a converted jail command for Hyperion, here is a command for example i need it converted like this[/size]

} else if (playerCommand.startsWith("clip")) { String filePath = "./src/server/world/WalkingCheck/"; BufferedWriter bw = null; try { bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(filePath, true)); bw.write("tiles.put("+c.heightLevel+" << 28 | "+c.absX+" << 14 | "+c.absY+", true);"); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch (IOException ioe) { ioe.printStackTrace(); } finally { if (bw != null) { try { bw.close(); } catch (IOException ioe2) { } } } Example

[size=18pt]i need a Jail and Unjail command with the part[/size]} else

[size=18pt]i dont know how to convert it

WILL REP++[/size]

Read full topic
